acceptCnilConditionsModalAcceptCheckboxL: I have read and understood the terms and conditions of use
acceptCnilConditionsModalAcceptStatsChec: I accept that my data be used for statistical purposes, after anonymisation
acceptCnilConditionsModalTermsLink: Click here to view the terms and conditions of use
acceptCookiesModalCheckboxLabel: I have read and understood the above information
acceptCookiesModalParagraph1: OpenFisca is a free simulation software of the French socio-fiscal system. It allows users to visualise a great number of benefits and taxes payed by households, and to simulate the impact of different policies on households' budgets. It is an educational tool whose purpose is to better understand the french socio-fiscal system
acceptCookiesModalParagraph2: The simulation is based the user input and on the applicable legislations. It cannot constitute an income statement
acceptCookiesModalParagraph3: The results obtained -using the information you entered, for which you are responsible- are to be used as indicators only. Thus, the taxes calculated from your income statement may differ.
incorrectSituationExplanation: Some entites or individuals contain errors. Here are your options :
incorrectSituationFixErrors: Correct errors to restore your simulation
minimumValueLessThanMaximumValueExplanat: Minimum value should be smaller than maximum value
resetSituationConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset? This will erase all entities and individuals
sessionHasExpiredExplanation: Your session has expired. The page will be reloaded with a default test case.
simulationErrorExplanation: The simulation failed because an orror occured on the server.
suggestedValueExplanation: Value suggested by the simulator and used for calculations
unknownValuesAbove: Values are unknown above {value, number, percent}
